item.title: Latest shards stats requests
item.description: Method Path Description GET /v1/shards/stats/last Get most recent stats for all shards GET /v1/shards/stats/last/{uid} Get most recent stats for a specific shard Get latest stats for all shards GET /v1/shards/stats/last Get most recent statistics for all shards. Required permissions Permission name view_all_shard_stats Request Example HTTP request GET /shards/stats/last?interval=1sec&stime=015-05-27T08:27:35Z Request headers Key Value Description Host cnm.cluster.fqdn Domain name Accept application/json Accepted media type Query parameters Field Type Description interval string Time interval for which we want stats: 1sec/10sec/5min/15min/1hour/12hour/1week.
